pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 9, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 9 2016:

Warsaw, Republic of Poland

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the meeting on Afghanistan with RESOLUTE SUPPORT Operations Partner Nations.

PGE National Stadium

Notes for media:

  • Coverage by host broadcaster
  • Pooled photo opportunity before the beginning of the meeting


12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council Meeting.

PGE National Stadium

Notes for media:

  • Coverage by host broadcaster
  • Pooled photo opportunity before the beginning of the meeting


2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the Republic of Latvia, Māris Kučinskis.

PGE National Stadium

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting


3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the meeting of the NATO-Ukraine Commission.

Notes for media:

  • Coverage by host broadcaster
  • Pooled photo opportunity before the beginning of the meeting


5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

PGE National Stadium

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
